name: Candy Riot
description:
Candy Riot is a game made from idea to release in -1 month challenge-, in October 2022. It's Halloween themed, web based game.

Command a gang of skeletons to get as many candy as they can get from the rival side. Help them with their limited skills by casting powerful spells.

This game is part of a discovery journey of Three js as a game technology, in combination with React, react-three-fiber and other tools from the pmndrs ecosystem.
